response.explain: The previous action code has successfully executed the subtask of taking out the cheese tart from the oven. The robot now has the cheese tart in its inventory. The next step is to move the robot to the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Put the cheese tart inside the fridge to freeze it.
(4) Take out the frozen cheese tart from the fridge.
(5) Put the frozen cheese tart back into the oven.
(6) Toggle on the oven to start cooking.
response.code:
